full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN PO BODHI SATVAS MDZAD PA'I GRIB SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES GU GUL GYIS BDUG ,YUNGS DKAR GYIS BRAB CING, YI DAM GYI SNGAGS SHAM DU SUMBHA NI DRAG TU BRJOD PAS BSKRAD, ,GLUD RKYANG RING POR BSKYAL LA, PHYI MIG MI BLTA BAR 'ONG DGOS, ,YID CHES ZHING KHUNGS BTZUN PA'I GRIB SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MKHAN PO BODHI SATVAS MDZAD PA'O, ,DGE BAS BDAG GZHAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI GRIB BYANG ZHING DAG PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
